title: Learning Chinese - Before you know it PRO
description:
Learning Chinese - Before you know it PRO

Everyone wants to see the world, but what do you do if you when your travels take you where English isn&#039;t common: France, for instance. Or Sweden, Brazil, Costa Rica, Russia, China, Indonesia? Sure, some people will speak your language, but not everyone, forcing you to makes compromises in communication, and sometimes creating real misunderstandings. Learning a language used to take months and even years: But with the Before You Know It line of language software, you can be speaking virtually any language in less than a week, giving you plenty of time to get ready for your trip.

Before You Know It won&#039;t make you fluent in a language. After completing the course you won&#039;t be able to do advanced verb conjugations or modify a noun. This is because Before You Know It focuses on teaching the words and phrases that you&#039;ll use most often. In almost any language 800-900 words and phrases are used 80-85% of the time conversationally. Before You Know It teaches you these words and phrases, allowing you to quickly amass a vocabulary that gives you remarkable flexibility wherever you happen to be.

The program works like this. Before You Know It is built around a number of lists. Each list contains about 10-14 dynamic flashcards united by a common theme; animals, greetings, etc. You then begin a five step process to perfect retention: Review It, Recognize, Know It, Produce It, Own It.

Each step gets more challenging, with the result being that after finishing the Own It stage, you can say and spell the words and phrases with 100% (guaranteed) perfect retention. Before You Know It is so successful because it&#039;s not just about memorization; the program adapts to you. Words you have trouble with come up more often, and you can even match you diction against a native speaker to ensure your pronunciation. It&#039;s dynamic, engaging and fun. The days of tedious class work are over. Thanks to Before You Know It, you&#039;re vacation will be perfect. You might even get mistaken for a local.
